name: Threaded Cane
description: A bladed whip disguised as a walking cane. Long range and an extremely sharp edge lets you take down targets while staying reletively safe.

name: Threaded Cleaver
description: A cleaver with the whip design of the threaded cane. Bigger, stronger, slower, and more brutal.

name: Sunlight Blade
description: A bright and shiny blade predating the first beast outbreak in the ancient city of Yharnam. Even in darkness it lights up everything around it.
